How Do I Pack On the Pounds?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Advance 2 Archive (GameBoy Advance): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): How Do I Pack On the Pounds?
By Nate Railsback on Monday, August 25, 2003 - 01:26 am:

I've been searching MRA2 for the best food to a bulk up my thin monster-- the opposite of Diet Weed, if you will. Dodorin Cake doesn't seem to do it very effectively, and while I've tried Cheese, I haven't used it enough to get a feel for it. Any clues?

By Mewger on Monday, August 25, 2003 - 06:23 am:

MeatSlab will do it! I know, I always give it to my dragons to make them happy... And then end up having to give them DietWeeds to counter the effect.

By GoldenBoy on Monday, August 25, 2003 - 10:23 am:

Yup Meat is and Meatslab are probably the best choices. So
is going a few months without battle.

By Nate Railsback on Monday, August 25, 2003 - 03:40 pm:

Yeah, but keeping Usagi-Sama (my Prince Hare) out of battle for months would have made him explode.

By Syfer on Monday, August 25, 2003 - 06:58 pm:

just keep using meat or meat slabs, it works well for me

By John Hawley on Tuesday, August 26, 2003 - 02:47 am:

Try resting the week you feed also. That seems to help pack the pounds on for me.
